I had a terrible experience with Citibank when applying for a new credit card. Upon receiving the card, it was immediately hit with fraudulent charges. I followed Citibank's advice to hold off on using it as they issued a replacement card and assured me the fraudulent charges would be reversed. However, this caused me to miss the minimum spend requirement to qualify for the free signup gift. When I reached out to them, they denied the free gift altogether. This is absolutely unacceptable. I trusted their process, and it ended up costing me. Very disappointed with their lack of accountability and poor customer service.
